file.name: oauth-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: OAuth 2.0 Server
  description: "This is a OAuth 2.0 Server Page sample of Home Project based on the OpenAPI 3.0 specification."
  license:
    name: MIT License
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /api/0/oauth2

tags:
  - name: Authentication
    description: API for managing OAuth 2.0.

paths:
  /server/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - Authentication
      summary: Authenticate User
      description: The endpoint generate access and refresh token
      operationId: authenticateUser
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/AuthenticationBody'
      responses:
        201:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/AuthenticationResponse'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
        default:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /server/refresh:
    post:
      tags:
        - Authentication
      summary: Update Access Token
      description: The endpoint update current access token.
      operationId: updateAccessToken
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/RefreshTokenBody'
      responses:
        201:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/AccessTokenResponse'
        406:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotAcceptable'
        default:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'

components:
  responses:
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
    InternalServerError:
      description: Something went wrong.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
    NotAcceptable:
      description: Not Acceptable
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
    AuthenticationResponse:
      description: OK
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateToken'
    AccessTokenResponse:
      description: OK
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccessToken'
  requestBodies:
    AuthenticationBody:
      description: A payload for generating tokens
      content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserCredentials'
    RefreshTokenBody:
      description: A payload for updating refresh token
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RefreshToken'
  schemas:
    UserCredentials:
      required:
        - email
        - password
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          pattern: '^([\w!#$%&''*+\/=?{|}~^-]|\.){1,60}@(?!-)(?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{2,250}+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,6}$'
          type: string
          example: "test@gmail.com"
          minLength: 5
          maxLength: 320
        password:
          pattern: '[a-zA-Z0-9]{8,}'
          type: string
          example: "mySuperStrongPass"
          minLength: 8
          maxLength: 128
    CreateToken:
      type: object
      properties:
        access_token:
          type: string
          example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIzIiwic3ViIjoidGVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE2NDI2OTI3NjEsImV4cCI6MTY0Mjc3OTE2MX0.9wlQed0cO5hEwT2934sVZPD4PSrwSvpMyFEoeFg0v3d6misQD7QdD-fy5Ovb1TkCP81UC9mvuSQvDYBVStkxOg"
        refresh_token:
          type: string
          example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIzIiwic3ViIjoidGVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE2NDI2OTI3NjIsImV4cCI6MTY0MzIzNDQwMH0.aUF-vGDOQRAZbTnA1KZiNY1unsbvipbplULb4azVPjO61YRZHIYwsWaYP5CiqiyHS_sO6LazinPdoLgVNrSucw"
    AccessToken:
      type: object
      properties:
        access_token:
          type: string
          example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIzIiwic3ViIjoidGVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE2NDI2OTI3NjEsImV4cCI6MTY0Mjc3OTE2MX0.9wlQed0cO5hEwT2934sVZPD4PSrwSvpMyFEoeFg0v3d6misQD7QdD-fy5Ovb1TkCP81UC9mvuSQvDYBVStkxOg"
    RefreshToken:
      required:
        - refresh_token
      type: object
      properties:
        refresh_token:
          type: string
          example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIzIiwic3ViIjoidGVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE2NDI2OTI3NjIsImV4cCI6MTY0MzIzNDQwMH0.aUF-vGDOQRAZbTnA1KZiNY1unsbvipbplULb4azVPjO61YRZHIYwsWaYP5CiqiyHS_sO6LazinPdoLgVNrSucw"
    ApiError:
      type: object
      properties:
        response_code:
          type: integer
          example: 406
        error_message:
            type: string
            example: "example"

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/server/login": post: requestBody: contents: application/json: generate schema: field email: string validator: pattern: error parsing regexp: invalid or unsupported Perl syntax: `(?!`
